snippet: Mr. Bouldin’s subjects included 20th-century Southern politicians, President Richard M. Nixon’s daughters and William Faulkner. His portraits hung in the White House and in Congress.
abstract: Marshall J Bouldin III, portrait artist whose paintings hung in the White House and Congress, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bouldin’s subjects included 20th-century Southern politicians, President Richard M. Nixon’s daughters and William Faulkner. His portraits hung in the White House and in Congress.

headline.seo: Marshall J. Bouldin III, Portrait Artist, Is Dead at 89
headline.main: Marshall J. Bouldin III, Painter of Politicians, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Marshall J. Bouldin III, 89; Painted Political Portraits
